TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ItemEvents_10_SendEventHandler(out bool Cancel);
.class public auto ansi sealed ItemEvents_10_SendEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ItemEvents_10_SendEventHandler(ByRef Cancel As Boolean)

param.name: Cancel
param.span: Se o procedimento de evento define este argumento como True, a operação de envio não será concluída e o Inspetor permanecerá aberto.

span.span: If the event procedure sets this argument to True, the send operation is not completed and the inspector is left open.

summary.span: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.

span.span: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
